newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Strattec estimates cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Strattec estimates cut.

text.p: -- Mesirow Financial Inc said Friday it is revising its earnings estimates for Strattec Security Corp in the wake of an earnings shortfall in the third quarter.
-- Mesirow revised its estimate for fiscal 1997 to a range of $1.65 and $1.70 a share from $1.74 and lowered its fiscal 1998 estimate to a range of $2.20 to $2.25 a share from $2.40.
-- Strattec reported third-quarter earnings of $0.51, versus $0.45 in 1996, below Mesirow's estimate of $0.54.
-- Mesirow said the gross margin shortfall stemmed from higher prices for zinc and inflation in Mexico that was not offset by an adjustment in the peso-US dollar exchange rate.
-- Mesirow said it maintained its focus buy rating on the company and a 12-month price target in the low $20s.
-- Strattec makes locks and other security devices for the automotive market.
-- Its shares closed up 1/8 Friday at 17.
